integration.description: Test execution failed: Authentication failed - cannot proceed with tests
integration.reproduction:
1. Run comprehensive test suite
2. Execution error occurs
integration.recommended_fix: Check test environment setup and API availability

detailed_bugs.description: Unable to authenticate with admin credentials

1. POST /auth/login with admin@mrvl.com / password123
2. Check response status and token
detailed_bugs.recommended_fix: Verify admin user exists and credentials are correct
